name: Next Scary Neighbor Home Door
description:
As You barave enough to enter into the neighbor house to find his mysterious activities. He killed the family and kidnaped a innocent girl. In this Hello next scary neighbor game you will assign different tasks to find the truth in the house. find keys and dig the grave in the house. collect some clues and infom the police about his mysteriuos activities

Features for Hello Next Angry Neighbor
1- Scary house
2- Mystery based mission, challenging levels
3- Murder case Game play, scary graphics and terrifying sounds
4- Smooth and Easy Controls!
5- Interesting activities!
6- Direction map and Hints!
7- Addictive Game play
